statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (8,-8) and (9,7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{7}-{\left(-{8}\right)}}}{{{9}-{\left({8}\right)}}}=\frac{{15}}{{1}} which reduces to \displaystyle{15} (if it's not already reduced)
